topic.title: HELP
topic.body: How can i report a user to an admin?

1566020351_15rMfe5FVSWwMffJvTpBUq9dFiLQP.body:
> [numismatist](#comment_82_1F8BHc6FztvWRy9cttVXLj22DSSvMdbGy): I m sticking with precious metals. [...]

you probably will be one of the first persons who will shit in his pants and give it back to them as soon as your government declare the possession illegal because your testosterone level is too low

P.S. pretty retarded to repeatedly tell everyone on ZeroTalk that you owe some
